elements.expression:
essql 
  query="SELECT 
count(id),
message_type

FROM \"message-flight-idx\"
GROUP BY message_type"
| dropdownControl valueColumn="message_type" filterColumn="message_type.keyword"
| render

essql 
  query="SELECT 
count(id),
direction_desc
FROM \"message-flight-idx\"
WHERE direction_desc is not null
GROUP BY direction_desc"
| dropdownControl valueColumn="direction_desc" filterColumn="direction_desc.keyword"
| render

essql query="SELECT 
count(id),
carrier

FROM \"message-flight-idx\"
GROUP BY carrier"
| dropdownControl valueColumn="carrier" filterColumn="carrier.keyword"
| render

essql 
  query="SELECT 
count(id),
origin

FROM \"message-flight-idx\"
GROUP BY origin
ORDER BY origin"
| dropdownControl valueColumn="origin" filterColumn="origin.keyword"
| render

essql 
  query="SELECT 
count(id),
destination

FROM \"message-flight-idx\"
GROUP BY destination
ORDER BY destination"
| dropdownControl valueColumn="destination" filterColumn="destination.keyword"
| render

| demodata
| markdown "Carrier"

| render
